name: TheMeditationMind.com
tag_list: meditation, yoga, breathing-techniques, relaxation, guided-meditation, stress-training, brain-health, meditation-cds, hemi-sync, gateway-voyage, learn-meditation
overview:
TheMeditationMind.Com exists to accomplish the following:

* Distribute information on meditation and relaxation techniques
* Lead sold-out meditation and spirituality workshops world-wide
* Help people evolve

Through meditation dramatic personal growth in both internal and external areas can be achieved. Information on meditation methods that can be used by anyone is distributed freely through the site. You can be a beginning meditation student or someone who has practiced yoga for decades and can sit in lotus, TheMeditationMind.com will expose you to many meditation techniques so that you can find the one that resonates with you the most.

When you are ready to take the next step and purchase a product to teach or supplement your meditation goals, explore the products for purchase on the site. Until that time, get the most of the content and feel free to use the contact page to suggest additional topics.

Enjoy your journey!

TheMeditationMind.com

external_links.title: To The Heart of The Matter
